commands.name: az afd rule action add
commands.summary: Update a new delivery rule within the specified rule set.
commands.syntax:
az afd rule action add [--actions]
                       [--add]
                       [--conditions]
                       [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                       [--ids]
                       [--match-processing-behavior {Continue, Stop}]
                       [--name]
                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                       [--order]
                       [--profile-name]
                       [--remove]
                       [--resource-group]
                       [--rule-set-name]
                       [--set]
                       [--subscription]

commands.name: az afd rule action list
commands.summary: Get an existing delivery rule within a rule set.
examples: az afd rule show -g group --rule-set-name ruleSetName --profile-name profile --rule-name rule1

commands.name: az afd rule action remove
commands.summary: Update a new delivery rule within the specified rule set.
commands.syntax:
az afd rule action remove [--actions]
                          [--add]
                          [--conditions]
                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--ids]
                          [--match-processing-behavior {Continue, Stop}]
                          [--name]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--order]
                          [--profile-name]
                          [--remove]
                          [--resource-group]
                          [--rule-set-name]
                          [--set]
                          [--subscription]
